ancestry.name: Android
languages: Additional languages equal to your Intelligence modifier (if positive). Choose from {@language Abyssal}, {@language Celestial}, {@language Draconic}, {@language Dwarven}, {@language Undercommon}, {@language Utopian|b1}, and any other languages to which you have access (such as the languages prevalent in your region).

features.name: Constructed
entries: Your synthetic body resists ailments better than those of purely biological organisms. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases, poisons, and radiation.

features.name: Emotionally Unaware
entries: You find it difficult to understand and express complex emotions. You take a –1 circumstance penalty to {@skill Diplomacy} and {@skill Performance} checks, and on {@skill Perception} checks to {@action Sense Motive|CRB}.

features.name: Low-Light Vision
entries: You can see in dim light as though it were bright light, and you ignore the {@condition concealed} condition due to dim light.

flavor: Technological wonders from another world, androids have synthetic bodies and living souls. Their dual nature makes them quick-thinking and calm under pressure, but comfortable in stillness and solitude.

heritage.name: Artisan Android
entries: Your body was originally designed to create works of art, complex tools, or maintain advanced machinery. You become trained in {@skill Crafting} (or another skill if you're already trained in {@skill Crafting}), and you gain the {@feat Specialty Crafting|CRB} skill feat in a specialty of your choice.

heritage.name: Impersonator Android
entries: Your body was augmented with processes and an appearance intended to blend in with humans more easily. You become trained in {@skill Deception} (or another skill if you're already trained in {@skill Deception}). You don't require a {@item disguise kit|CRB} when attempting {@skill Deception} checks to {@action Impersonate|CRB} a human. In addition, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to {@action Impersonate|CRB} checks to pretend that you're a human version of yourself, rather than an android. This bonus doesn't apply to other checks to {@action Impersonate|CRB} humans.

heritage.name: Laborer Android
entries: Your body is adapted to endure physical hardships or perform hard labor for long periods of time. You become trained in {@skill Athletics} (or another skill if you're already trained in {@skill Athletics}), and you gain the {@feat Hefty Hauler|CRB} skill feat.

heritage.name: Polyglot Android
entries: You were preprogrammed with a multitude of linguistic proficiencies, likely to act as a translator. You learn two new languages, chosen from common languages and any uncommon languages you have access to. These languages take the same form (signed or spoken) as your other languages. If you select the {@feat Multilingual} feat, you learn three new languages instead of two.

heritage.name: Warrior Android
entries: Your body was originally created to function as a security officer or soldier. You're a naturally gifted warrior preprogrammed for combat. You're trained in all simple and martial weapons.
